Ingredients.11: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.12: 2  zucchini, finely chopped, or more to taste

Ingredients.14: 3 medium tomatoes, peeled and finely chopped

Ingredients.15: 2 cups cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

Ingredients.17: 1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste

Directions.1: Heat oil over medium heat in a stockpot. Stir in leek and onion and cook for 5 to 6 minutes. Add carrots, celery, and garlic; cook for 5 minutes. Add potatoes and cook for 2 to 3 minutes more.

Directions.2: Pour hot vegetable broth into the pot and stir well. Add bay leaf and thyme; season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil; reduce heat and let simmer for 10 to 12 minutes.

Directions.3: Stir in zucchini and peas. Let simmer for 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, cover, and let simmer for 5 to 8 minutes.

Directions.4: Uncover the pot and stir in beans. Let simmer for 10 minutes; stir in pesto sauce and let simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand for 3 to 4 minutes. Serve topped with Parmesan cheese.
